Bibliographic references

Source: vignettes/papers.Rmd
papers.Rmd

Ade4 papers

Here is a list of papers about ade4 package and its methods.

Dray S, Dufour A (2007). “The ade4 Package: Implementing the Duality Diagram for Ecologists.” Journal of Statistical Software, 22(4), 1–20. doi:10.18637/jss.v022.i04. PDF

Bougeard S, Dray S (2018). “Supervised Multiblock Analysis in R with the ade4 Package.” Journal of Statistical Software, 86(1), 1–17. doi:10.18637/jss.v086.i01.

Chessel D, Dufour A, Thioulouse J (2004). “The ade4 Package – I: One-Table Methods.” R News, 4(1), 5–10. https://cran.r-project.org/doc/Rnews/. PDF

Dray S, Dufour A, Chessel D (2007). “The ade4 Package – II: Two-Table and K-Table Methods.” R News, 7(2), 47–52. https://cran.r-project.org/doc/Rnews/. PDF

Thioulouse, J., D. Chessel, S. Dolédec, and J. M. Olivier. (1997). ADE-4: a multivariate analysis and graphical display software. Statistics and Computing 7:75-83. doi:10.1023/A:1018513530268. PDF

Published papers citing ade4
